Title: Prescribes uniform system of accounts for power authority of the state of New York
Summary: Requires the power authority of the state of New York to file a report annually commencing March 31, 2023 with the governor, the comptroller, the chair of the assembly ways and means and the senate finance committees, respectively, and the authority budget office, on its operations and transactions, complying with the uniform system of accounts required for electric corporations pursuant to the public service law.
LawCode: Amd ยง1002, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to prescribing a uniform system of accounts for the power authority of the state of New York
